item.title: org-roam-template config
item.description: references https://seds.nl/notes/export_org_roam_backlinks_with_gohugo/ https://www.linuxzen.com/notes/notes/20211231142642-org_roam_export_backlinks_on_hugo/ Doom-emacs # press SPC f p to open config.el file. Set default settings. # ; file-truename function is only necessary when you use symbolic links inside org-roam-directory. (setq org-roam-directory (file-truename "~/org/roam")) ; provide link completion matching outside of Org links. (setq org-roam-completion-everywhere t) ; always resolve symlinks, at a performance cost (setq find-file-visit-truename t) ; ensure that Org-roam is available on startup (org-roam-db-autosync-mode) ; To build the cache manually, run M-x org-roam-db-sync.
